mapper.update: update zp_feedback_info set deal_time = #{dealTime}, deal_content = #{dealContent}, status = '1' where job_id = #{jobId}
mapper.select: select user_id, user_name, phone_num, apply_time, (case when work_status = '0' then '待审批' when work_status = '1' then '已录用' when work_status = '2' then '拒绝录用' else work_status end ) as workStatus from zp_apply_info where job_id = #{jobId} order by apply_time desc -- and work_status = '0'

select company_id, user_id, user_name, phone_num, job_id, apply_time, (case when work_status = '0' then '已报名' when work_status = '1' then '已被录用' when work_status = '2' then '已被拒绝' else '未报名' end ) as workStatus from zp_apply_info where user_id = #{userId} order by apply_time desc

select a.user_id, a.job_id, a.work_status, b.job_name, c.company_id, c.company_name from zp_apply_info a left join zp_work_info b on a.job_id = b.job_id left join zp_comp_info c on a.company_id = c.company_id where a.user_id = #{userId} and a.job_id = #{jobId}
mapper.insert: insert into zp_work_info (company_id, job_name, job_type, link_man, phone_num, release_time, pay_way, job_require, job_status, job_id) values (#{companyId}, #{jobName}, #{jobType}, #{linkMan}, #{phoneNum}, #{releaseTime}, #{payWay}, #{jobRequire}, #{jobStatus}, #{jobId})

insert into zp_apply_info (user_id, user_name, phone_num, job_id, apply_time, work_status, company_id) values (#{userId}, #{userName}, #{phoneNum}, #{jobId}, #{applyTime}, #{workStatus}, #{companyId})
insert into zp_check_job_his (job_id, operation, operation_time) values (#{jobId}, #{operation}, #{operationTime})
mapper.delete: delete from zp_apply_info where user_id = #{userId} and job_id = #{jobId}
